description.value:
You upgrade the vishkanyan venom you can apply with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Envenom]{Envenom} to greater vishkanyan venom. Envenom's frequency becomes once per minute.

Greater Vishkanyan Venom (level 17)

Frequency once per minute

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 [[/r 7d6[poison]]] damage (1 round)

Stage 2 [[/r 9d6[poison]]] damage (1 round)

Stage 3 [[/r 11d6[poison]]] damage (1 round)
